explains: n. <英>炊具，锅，厨灶；<英，非正式>适宜煮食而不宜生吃的水果（尤指某种苹果）
wordGroup: pressure cooker n. 高压锅；加压蒸汽速煮器
rice cooker 电饭锅，电饭煲
electric rice cooker n. 电锅

sentences.en: The pressure cooker is very useful for people who go out all day.
sentences.cn: 压力锅对整天外出的人非常有用。

sentences.en: I'm looking for a cooker today.
What's wrong with your new electric cooker?
sentences.cn: 你新买的电饭煲怎么了？
